title: not simple
description: A STORY WITHIN A STORY,A BOOK WITHIN A BOOK,A TALE ABOUT THE SEARCH FOR FAMILY,FOR AN EMOTIONAL HOME.Ian, a young man with a fractured family history, travels from Australia to England to America in the hope of realizing his dreams and reuniting with his beloved sister. His story unfolds backwards through the framing narrative of Jim, a reporter driven to capture Ianâ€™s experiences in a novel: not simple.
author: Natsume Ono
